data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Novosibirsk, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Novosibirsk, Russia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 39,014 believers in the state of Novosibirsk the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 68 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Novosibirsk.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Novosibirsk, Russia find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Baraba Tatar, Siberian people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Baraba Tatar, Siberian people know you.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Novosibirsk that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Novosibirsk, Russia to the gospel today.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Novosibirsk, Russia who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.
